file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 76-13-01-04 - IDLE STOP ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL IDLE STOP ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove/install the idle stop assy. B. The idle stop assy is installed in the thrust lever of the control stand assembly. C. These procedures are applicable to the LH and RH idle stop assemblies. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 76-13-01-000-801-A IDLE STOP ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL ALL 76-13-01-400-801-A IDLE STOP ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 76-13-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 76-13-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. IDLE STOP ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) Obey these instructions to remove the idle stop assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM TASK 27-63-03-000-801-A/400 SPEED BRAKE COMMAND LEVER - REMOVAL AMM TASK 76-11-01-000-801-A/400 CONTROL STAND ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL AMM TASK 76-11-05-000-801-A/400 CONTROL STAND MASK - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223OZ Control pedestal 223 223NZ Control pedestal 223 223SZ Control Pedestal 223 223RZ Control Pedestal D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the LIGHTS - PEDESTAL PANEL circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) Remove access panels 223SZ and 223RZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). (3) Remove the control stand mask ( AMM TASK 76-11-05-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 76-13-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Remove the aileron-disconnect indication light from panel 223NZ, but do not disconnect the electrical connector ( AMM TASK 76-11-01-000-801-A/400). (5) NOTE: To do the step that follows, loosen the aileron-disconnect indication-light harness through access panel 223RZ. Move access panel 223NZ to the right side of the control pedestal ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). (6) Remove the speed-brake command lever (AMM TASK 27-63-03-000-801-A/400). (7) Remove the elevator-disconnect indication light from panel 223OZ, but do not disconnect the electrical connector ( AMM TASK 76-11-01-000-801-A/400). (8) NOTE: To do the step that follows, loosen the elevator-disconnect indication-light harness through access panel 223SZ. Move access panel 223OZ to the left side of the control pedestal ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the ring retainer (2) from the tip of the thrust-lever rod assembly (4). (2) Remove the idle stop (3) from the thrust-lever rod assembly. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 76-13-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Idle Stop Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B DET. A A 4. ROD ASSEMBLY 5. THRUST LEVERS 3. IDLE STOP 2. RING RETAINER DET. C 1. CONTROL STAND ASSY. C DET. B 145AMM760020.MCE C EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 76-13-01 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details. MAX FREE FREE THRUST SET LOCKED LOCKED IDLE MAX REV MAX REV

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 76-13-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. IDLE STOP ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) Obey these instructions to install the idle stop assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM TASK 27-63-03-400-801-A/400 SPEED BRAKE COMMAND LEVER - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 76-11-01-400-801-A/400 CONTROL STAND ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 76-11-05-400-801-A/400 CONTROL STAND MASK - INSTALLATION IDLE LOCK SOLENOID - ADJUSTMENT PROCE- AMM TASK 76-13-02-820-801-A/500 DURES C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223OZ Control pedestal 223 223NZ Control pedestal 223 223SZ Control Pedestal 223 223RZ Control Pedestal D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the idle stop (3) to the thrust-lever rod assembly (4). (2) Install the retainer ring (2) to the tip of the thrust-lever rod assembly. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 76-13-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Do the idle-solenoid adjustment procedure (AMM TASK 76-13-02-820-801-A/500). (2) Install access panel 223OZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). (3) Install the elevator-disconnect indication light to panel 223OZ ( AMM TASK 76-11-01-400-801-A/400). (4) Install the speed-brake command lever (AMM TASK 27-63-03-400-801-A/400). (5) Install access panel 223NZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). (6) Install the aileron-disconnect indication light to panel 223NZ ( AMM TASK 76-11-01-400-801-A/400). (7) Install the control stand mask ( AMM TASK 76-11-05-400-801-A/400). (8) Install access panels 223SZ and 223RZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). (9) On the circuit breaker panel, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the LIGHTS - PEDESTAL PANEL circuit breaker. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 76-13-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
